fields.value: Opium Consumption Data for Netherlands East Indies, 1925-1938

dsDescriptionValue.value: Data on user licenses, opium consumption, and revenue from opium sales in the Netherlands East Indies during the years from 1925 through 1938.  Please contact Siddharth Chandra at chandr45@msu.edu with any questions.

keywordValue.value: opium, consumption, revenue, Netherlands East Indies, Indonesia, Dutch East Indies

publicationCitation.value: Opium en zoutregie. Verslag betreffende de Opium- en Zoutregie en de Zoutwinning. Batavia, Landsdrukkerij, various years. (Titles vary by year)

fields.value: This data set needs a more robust description and a translation of the source information.

contributorName.value: CHIA (Collaborative for Historical Information and Analysis)

distributorAffiliation.value: CHIA (Collaborative for Historical Information and Analysis)
